## Required Tools for the Basic Model

| Name                          | Required | Photo                                                                                   |
| ----------------------------- | -------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 3D Printer                    | Yes      | <img style="width: 300px" src="images/3d-printer.jpg" alt="3D Printer" />               |
| Soldering iron                | Yes      | <img style="width: 300px" src="images/soldering-iron.jpg" alt="Soldering iron" />       |
| Solder                        | Yes      | <img style="width: 300px" src="images/solder.jpg" alt="Solder" />                       |

| Wire stripper AWG28 and AWG14 | Optional | <img style="width: 300px" src="images/wire-stripper.jpg" alt="Wire stripper" />         |

These parts are not necessary for building the Basic Model.
